title: Leader of the Indian delegation Sushma Swaraj calls on President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma Pix by Sudath Silva The visiting Indian parliamentary delegation to Sri Lanka headed by the Leader of the Opposition in Lok Sabha, Sushma Swaraj called on President Mahinda Rajapaksa at the President’s House (Janadhipathi Mandiraya) in Colombo this morning on Friday 20 April….
